message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product. It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1200000. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to you.
I appreciate the offer, Alice. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $900000. I believe that's a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that you're looking for a better deal. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $1100000. I believe this is a fair compromise considering the product's value to you.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice, but I'm still a bit short of that number. I'm thinking more along the lines of $950000. I believe that's a fair price considering the product's value to me.
I understand that you're still looking for a better deal, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer $1050000. This is as low as I'm willing to go, considering the product's value to me.

I appreciate your willingness to make one more concession, Alice, but I'm still not sure I can meet you at $1050000. I'm thinking more along the lines of $925000. I believe that's a fair price considering the product's value to me.

I understand that you're still looking for a better deal, Bob. However, I'm not willing to go any lower than $1050000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, but I need to get closer to my desired price. I'll offer you $975000. This is my final offer.

Alice, I appreciate your final offer, but I'm still a bit short of that number. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to get closer to my target price. I'll offer $950000, and that's my final offer. If you're willing to accept it, I'm ready to make a deal.
